alert.note: Alert for Central Colorado River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 12 at 3:56AM MST until December 13 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches with locally higher amounts traveling up Hwy 82 corridor and through Glenwood Canyon. * WHERE...Debeque to Silt Corridor and Central Colorado River Basin. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Colorado River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor
